showerReviews.reviewText: I've been going to the community center over 40 years. We love the pool. My kids went there, and my grandkids go there. The gym where you can walk all those laps in ac and heat is great. We never had a negative day at any of the facilities.

My cousin had died from covid and this place was chosen for the repast. It was clean, the staff was extremely accommodating and professional. We had a blast inside and out. Family is absolutely EVERYTHING!! In the area we were in, we had full access to everything including the games.

This spot really surprised me. There are so many different activities that you can be a part of.....there's even an outdoor track to ride your skateboard or race a remote controlled vehicle on. I was here for a baby shower. There was also a ‚Ä¶
